Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Nobody else is making this type of game anymore. 2010 heavy rain. 2013 two souls. I miss them and I love them. If you like them you would know how amazing Until dawn is.  I am worrying about how long I have to wait to see more games like this. I give Heavy rain a 9/10\, two souls a 7.5/10 and Until dawn a 10/10. Cmon\, until dawn 2 next year pls.
